tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: *********** *** ** *** **** ************** ** ***** She has all the patience to listen to all our concerns and make sure she answers all our queries. She gives us the confidence that our kid is in safe hands and am very sure that my son is very comfortable with her. Always greets with a smile and speaks in the same tone through out, irrespective of the knowledge we carry or the background we come from. To mention few virtues i noticed in her- very professional, ************** keen observer, analyses facts quickly, no nonsense doctor, most importantly my kid is happy when she's around. I would definitely recommend her to all parents who are looking out for a great doctor to consult.

tags: None
review:
I delivered a low birth weight baby and he was in Milan hospital Nicu unit (Ovum Hospital) for 15 days where I met Dr. Shalini.  Entire Nicu unit took care of my baby very well with able guidance of Dr. Shalini.  After discharge we are consulting her regularly for regular check ups and vaccination.  

She is very friendly, calm, approachable and a patient listener. She spends enough time with the baby to understand the problem and prescribes medicines.   Also she is reachable over phone anytime on emergency. 

When my baby was diagnosed with Heart problems she refered to a best cardiologist in city to continue his cardiac related treatment. I am very happy to see such doctor who takes care of the baby very well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Fantastic first time experience,Dr.Shaline is very professional, polite, positive and down to Earth person, makes you feel at home, very friendly.explained everything about my baby condition and answered all questions that I had.  Never felt rushed and i addressed all my concerns. The best experience I've ever had with a pediatrician. I would highly recommend her to others.

tags: Value for money,
review: Consulted@Promed Hospital reg ADHD in 4.8yr 'F' child. Consult Fees Rs1250 and was adviced to go to Synapse institute for assesment therapies (behaviour/speech/physio) I didnt get any new info from consultation beyond what you get in web etc. but fees charged is 2.5x for ADHD category. Dr Rao mentioned that Paediatric Neurologist from UK universities do not give medications for <8yr kids, ** ** ****** ** ******* *** *** **** ** ****** *** **** ****** **** **** ******************** ***** *** *** *** *** **** ***** **** ********* ********* ** ****** ***** ** ******* ** **** **** ****** ******** ******* ******************* **** **** ** ****** *** **** ***** ******* **** ** ***** ***** Rest do best for your child.Thanks and hope review is useful to patients.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: We had been consulting with the doctor from birth till 5 months. She is someone who believes I’m not giving unnecessary medications to the baby which is good. But she isn’t very friendly. It’s very difficult for new parents to ask her questions. She is rude at times. She is undoubtedly a good doctor but a little more patience and friendliness would help. That’s the reason I changed the pead for my baby.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We have been consulting Dr. Shalini for our daughter since her birth and have always found her extremely approachable. She doesn't mind responding to our parental concerns on Whatsapp either. Another reason why we trust her with the health of our little girl is that she doesn't unnecessarily prescribe medication. We strongly recommend her and our grateful to have her as our child's doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Our experience with Dr. Shalini Rao has been wonderful.we are visiting for last 1 year for our twins. She interacts in a very friendly manner and answers all our queries patiently, irrespective of whether the questions are relevant or not. Always recommend home remedies.  That's what we love most.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Our experience with Dr. Shalini Rao has been wonderful. She interacts with us and our daughter in a very friendly manner and answers all our queries patiently, irrespective of whether the questions are relevant to the visit or not. More importantly she is available personally for us, and always responds anytime we reach out to her. Her treatments are spot on, gives enough time to try and understand the cause of the illness.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,Doctor friendliness,
review: She is very nice in terms of taking care of our new born. She is patient and replies to all our queries with equal zeal and efforts. She hardly gets irritated on even the silliest question asked by us, as we were apprehensive about our baby's health and development.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
From the time my delivery happened it was Doctor  Shalini who took a lot of care from day one to my baby boy,My baby was in safe hands from day one. Dr Shalini Rao  treated very nicely  my baby in critical times during his stay in Millan hospital , she is a good listener and explains the health issues to parents very clearly . I met some  parents who shared the same experience about Dr  shalini Rao and it was wonderful feedback.

        The best part of her is her approach towards the child  , she is easily reachable by mobile and guidance his excellent makes parents feel comfortable during tense situations. I am very pleased for having Dr shalini rao as my baby's doctor.

tags: None
review: We would definitely recommend her service* *** *** **** ************** measured and sensible in her advise and explained common issues babies face and why.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Have been consulting Dr.Shalini right from the birth of my baby. She explains everything in detail, takes queries patiently and the best part is not recommending any unnecessary medicines for the baby.

tags: None
review: Very communicative doctor. Good response and accurate. Would recommend everyone. Have visited her after previous bad experiences with other child neuro doctors.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review: She is one of the fewest doctors where she gives enough time to patients to explain the problem and diagnose, this is good part she unnecessarily never ask you do medical tests, also never gives any extra medications, if at all it will be through food or natuaral way, big thumps up to her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Thank you doctor for your valuable advise for my daughter 
And how smoothly the vaccination happened today
We were very scared but you handled it with utmost care
Thank you sooo much
Also for waiting for us since we were late reaching hospital due to traffic

review: Listen to the problem, Understanding the problem, give solution to the problem problem.. Every thing is wonderful...

review: Doctor wont recommend unnecessary medicines to kids which is rare that you can see from today's corporate doctor's, she always suggests home remedies and natural cure.

Very friendly Doctor, she took time to explain the causes and remedies of the problem. I felt very confident after I spoke to her about my baby's illness
I would recommend this doctor to my friends and family
